title: Moved to OCE and lost Mastery badges.
body:
Are you supposed to lose ALL of your champion mastery when you join a different server?
Do I have to start "Mastering" my champions all over again?

replies.body:
Hey BeSpooks,

Below is a list of things that won't transfer with you between servers: 

>Unclaimed referral rewards 
Referrals 
Friends list 
Honor Points and Crests 
Forum Badges 
Justice Rating 
Current Ranked League placement 
Team Rewards points 
Champion Mastery

You can find this list and additional information on the [**Account Transfer FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751924-Account-Transfer-FAQ#h2q1) Riot Games Support article!
